Furry Lamb Lost

迷失的羊羔

G+ ImpressionLife
Feb 14, 2017

Just lost my lovely little lamb given to me by accident two years ago. God please forgive me. I somehow starts to believe that it was fate to let me have it, and also fate to let me lose it. I tried to fill my mind up with the story of a fiery bunny swallowing a lovely lamb, which obviously didn't do the job. So I've done the search but found nothing. Probably God has just gave it to someone else, I believe it.

Lost
